subject: fix: improve UI visibility and tone color distinction
body:
- Add useKeyboardHeight hook for mobile web keyboard detection using
  visualViewport API to keep compose bar visible above keyboard
- Update tone tags on own messages (blue bubble) to show category colors
  with dark background instead of semi-transparent white
- Increase tone selector border visibility (40% to 80% opacity, 1.5px)
- Create ChatBackground component with proper CSS radial gradients for
  the dot pattern background on web
- Update CLAUDE.md and HISTORY.md documentation
title: improve UI visibility and tone color distinction
